description: Lightweight, this fabric is infused with technical fibres for breathability and functionality on hot weather days. A zippered thigh pocket for secure storage offers versatility across activities.
name: Duer Live Lite Journey Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 62% Cotton, 30% Tencel™ Lyocell, 6% Lycra® T400® Polyester, 2% Lycra® Spandex
Duer's signature hidden guesset (performance feature) is integrated for extended range of motion and true flexibility
Duer's fabrics stretch in all directions, for maximum comfort, flexibility and maneuverability
Tencel Lyocell offers moisture wicking properties so you feel cool and dry
